# iru_vulnerabilities (Data Source)

List all vulnerabilities from Vulnerability Management.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "iru_vulnerabilities" "critical" {}

output "vulnerability_ids" {
  value = [
    for v in data.iru_vulnerabilities.critical.results : v.cve_id 
    if v.severity == "CRITICAL"
  ]
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Read-Only

- `results` (Attributes List) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--results))

<a id="nestedatt--results"></a>
### Nested Schema for `results`

Read-Only:

- `cve_id` (String)
- `cvss_score` (Number)
- `device_count` (Number)
- `first_detection_date` (String)
- `severity` (String)
- `software` (List of String)
- `status` (String)
